column5: Enjoy our gorgeous, spacious guest suite on the lake with private bath and entrance. Dock on the edge of wooded lot, private patio and fire pit tucked away in the trees. Rental kayaks available for lake exploring.  Close to Bush airport, major freeways, restaurants, and shopping. About 30 minutes from downtown, NRG Stadium and The Galleria. In quiet, gated neighborhood. Couples, solo adventurers, business travelers & families welcome.   1 King, 2 Twins Coffee Maker, Fridge, Microwave
